rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with integrated dining space. Large windows on the eastern side for morning light, aligned to Vastu guidelines ensuring positivity and balance.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact guest bathroom designed for efficiency, featuring a minimalist sink, toilet and shower area with essential fixtures. Placed away from the main living spaces as per Vastu advice for privacy and energy flow.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space designed with minimal distractions. South-facing window provides natural light, adhering to Vastu principles by ensuring clarity and focus in work areas.

rooms.name: Utility & Storage
rooms.description: Essential storage area for household utilities including a pantry, laundry, and miscellaneous storage. Located near the kitchen for ease of access.
